Windlord:

Windlord Screamed "NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!" 

And ran towards Deemos.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Ooh, okay.
> 
> BIC: Deemos grabs Rae and moves her in front of the knife (Orchid's
> permission to do this). He puts his gun, set to nail mode, to her 
gut.
> 
> Deemos: Chivtrons, you aren't very smart, not as smart as I thought 
you were
> originally, even. You let this perfectly good but annoying woman 
die.
> 
> Deemos fires the nail gun 18 times...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>

> Subject: Re: Trinity

long as

the

only for

see

to start
> from
> > > > scratch.
> > > >
> > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > >     Aerotaur flinches as Grounded's blasts fly past his 
head.  He
> wonders
> > > > silently why Grounded shot at Deemos when he was so close.  
He spots
> the
> > > > knives flying at Trinity and he deftly sprints in front of 
them.  He
> > > manages
> > > > to deflect on with his wing but the other imbeds itself in his
> shoulder.
> > > > "YOU WILL DIE!!!!!"  His left arm hangs limp from the knife 
in his
> > > shoulder.
> > > > He reaches up and yanks it out of his skin.  Mech fluid 
sprays onto
> the
> > > > ground.  Using only his right arm he flings the knife back at 
Deemos.
> "He
> > > is
> > > > mine Grounded.  This is an old battle.  Keep Trinity safe."  
With that
> > > said
> > > > he launches himself at Deemos.  He begins slashing at his 
head with
> his
> > > > energy-bladed staff.
